overview: Hendrik Klindworth (27) is Co-Founder and Chief Technical Officer of InnoGames. He focuses on programming and gamedesign. He began to program computer games when he was 14 years old and entered the Browsergame sphere in 2003, when he created the game Tribal Wars together with his brother Eike Klindworth and his school friend Michael Zillmer. Today, Tribal Wars is one of the most successful Browsergames ever, with 33 million users from more than 200 countries. To create the first playable version only took them one month of programming. InnoGames was in 2007 founded as a consequence of this huge success. Hendrik Klindworth studied IT with a focus on Information Systems and Software Engineering in Oldenburg, Germany.
